website_summaries.verdict: Coated in bronze, it's perfect for holding and drip drying mugs, cups, and bottles. The rack won't tip over from the weight of the mugs.
pros: This item comes with a heavy base that stabilizes the 10-inch mug tree
Made from steel, it won’t rust and it’s extremely durable
Holds up to 15 mugs, bottles or glasses, and its solid dark finish makes for gorgeous decor in home, work and retail spaces
cons: Larger cups and mugs don’t fit comfortably on the bottom row
Some of the prongs are close together

customer_reviews.title: Super cute mug tree for my Rae Dunn mugs
customer_reviews.text: Super cute mug tree for my Rae Dunn mugs. Only problem is that the bottom row has hooks to have a mug on it but I’m not sure how you could actually use it because It made the cup just lay on the counter and that looks funny. But, still plenty of room for 10 or so on the upper hooks!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina McGehee

customer_reviews.title: Do not look any further! This is a great price and product!
customer_reviews.text: I spent too much time reviewing coffee mug holders, checking several different websites, comparing prices and materials, etc. I finally decided on this one, mostly because of the price and the fact that it holds so many mugs. I'm very pleased with this purchase. The mug holder is the perfect size to fit in one of the shelves of my "coffee station", holds all of my coffee cups, is very stable, and looks nice too. After comparing prices, I hoped this would be a decent one for $20, and I'm more than happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Powers

customer_reviews.title: Go to Christmas Tree Shop and get it for a lot less!
customer_reviews.text: It was reasonably priced compared to the other options. Looks a little cheap, but the part that is important to know is that the bottom hooks are far too low. You couldn't put your smallest teacup (which I don't have, I like BIG mugs) on the hook and have it hang, it would just be lying on it's side on the counter. I ended up placing my "tree" on a container that held the coffee and rigging it up so it wouldn't slide around. It's fine for it's purpose, but I wouldn't have bought if I had known this before hand. All in all, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Our kitchen counter is much better organized now. Cons: - Can't hang regular sized mugs on the lowest level since the mug then touches the counter top. But they hang just fine on the other two top levels.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have a coffee corner in my kitchen and this fit perfectly. I do wish it stood a bit taller so I could fit all of my mugs without them resting on the counter. It is stationary so it doesn't spin around for easy access. Overall this is a good product. Sturdy and holds all of my mugs. Also it looks GREAT with my countertops. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren_4

customer_reviews.title: Holds all my cups, no hooks wasted
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find a cup holder that actually holds oversized coffee cups, normally you have to skip a hook or two because you can't squeeze another cup in. This product was designed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kattee

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake
customer_reviews.text: The mug tree holds 15 cups I got the it to hold exspresso cups. By the picture you’d think that it hold 15 cups . I have 15 cups on it but they are laying on the counter. If I’m making exspresso for company I don’t want to be catching my cups as they fly all around. It makes me look bad . Why are you selling these cup hangers they don’t work I want a new cup holder on you. This is a big mistake
customer_reviews.author: Paula Nowak

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: All though I am not using it as a mug rack, it is working perfectly for me. Nice weight, seems very well made. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Judith JohnsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my Dunn mugs. Gave 4 stars cause can not put mugs on bottom cause to close to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: philip shaw

customer_reviews.title: Oversized and useless
customer_reviews.text: Quality/sturdiness is fine. Completely useless funtionality. It has more hooks than other holders so has you believe holds more. Nope...just more hooks. Bottom row completely useless, and top row bangs cups with second row. I have multiple sized cups that I tried and it's all the same. Not to mention the dang think is clunky in size. Very disappointed and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Well made, attractive and functional!
customer_reviews.text: This was an anniversary gift for my wife. She loves it! My only concern is that it takes a good amount of real estate and ours is limited. Nothing wrong, just something to consider. We're using it with all oversized cups so it's crowded and takes a little attention to not have them bang into each other when one is removed. Overall very pleased and definitely happy that my wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Great for displaying and organizing mugs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Rae Dunn mugs. It will hold 10 of these larger mugs, and I'm really happy to have it for my tea/cocoa station!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to hang larger mugs vertically but it doesn't work. One fell off and broke. The others seemed very unstable. With mugs hung horizontally, rack only holds 8 cups and is much too large for my space. It's been relegated to the closet with no mugs...a total waste of money! I would return it, but discarded the box and packing! Can't suggest this as a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of mugs!
customer_reviews.text: It takes up a bit of space on the kitchen counter, but that frees up a large shelf in the cabinet where I stored my extensive collection of mugs. I like the way the mugs hang on the tree... upside down over the hooks. It seems much more stable than hanging them by the handle. I’m very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong as a mug!
customer_reviews.text: Have too many mugs? Want to stylishly display them? This is it. I love this tree because it's sturdy and holds the mugs on the counter that we WANT to use. The other ones are in the cabinet. No more opening and closing doors for us!
customer_reviews.author: Moniquins

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: I got this mug rack as a display for craft fairs and as soon as I went to hang one of my mugs on the top row, the hook immediately broke off and the mug fell and broke. I would not recommend this product if you are trying to display important or valuable mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Trent B

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and very functional!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a compact way to store my mugs that's also convenient. This mug holder is awesome and blends nicely with my kitchen decor! It handles the larger mugs with ease as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Alston

customer_reviews.title: the stand is sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I left one star off because the first row of pegs is too close to the bottom that mugs cannot be hung by their handles. Instead, they can only be placed upside down on it, which is not the most stable method. However, the stand is sturdy and nice looking. I just have to rethink the use for it...maybe for espresso coffee cups??
customer_reviews.author: N. Boccanfuso

customer_reviews.title: Replacement works
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was damaged badly. I got a replacement and have not had any problems. It is a little flimsy but as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joey W.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, but did not work for me. Bottom posts are so low that the cups lay on the counter if hung from handles. Returned
customer_reviews.author: B. Followell

customer_reviews.title: Make a good display
customer_reviews.text: We got tired of having all our mugs piled in the cupboard. Looked for something to have our favorite mugs on display next to coffee pot and espresso machine. Product is durable, not issues when arrived, holds all 6 of our mugs no problem with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Cupholder is very sturdy, I love the bronze color and came assembled. The only problem I have with it is the first tier holders are to close to the counter to hold my mugs, which I must say are oversized.
customer_reviews.author: Foxtale

customer_reviews.title: I have 14 mugs of different shapes and they all fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Very strong and does not tilt when removing mugs. I have this sitting on my counter and have had no problems with handles too low. You can turn the handle to the side. I have 14 mugs of different shapes and they all fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: MegH

customer_reviews.title: No more mugs stacked haphazardly....
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best mug holder. It holds 15 mugs in a fairly compact space. I actually am using it to organize inside a cabinet, and it fits in the small space if I eliminate several spaces on the back. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary D. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Holds many mugs!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to create a coffee area in my new home and researched several set ups to decide what I would like to put on my counter. I love this holder because it holds my sign and many mugs with it! It is sturdy and just the right size to fit under a cabinet
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary G

customer_reviews.title: May appear larger in picture
customer_reviews.text: This will not hold 15 large cups. Apparently, my idea of a large cup isn’t the same as theirs. To much of a hassle to mail back. Will probably donate or give away.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah vause

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand alone with cups on bottom
customer_reviews.text: Sending back. Didn't notice when ordering. On no legs, so cups on bottom will not hang, they hit the table. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Betty Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mug holder to corral our plethora of mugs, and this works very well. I can wash my mugs and put them right on this rack to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Margena Adams Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Strong attractive holder. Only issue is that the bottom holder can only hold small mugs, and yet the mugs will rest on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Zbonet

customer_reviews.title: Great Mug holder
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for the price. I have several larger mugs that I wanted to move to the cup holder to make room in my cabinet. This mug holder works great, there are plenty of spikes to put your mugs on and it is pretty sturdy. I have it on my cabinet and it looks nice. Good product. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LYnnette Mahler

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be returning this product. I felt this mug tree was short and wide. Makes everything look like a jumbled up mess. I tried different ways to stack, but it just looks messy to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Not for coffee mugs, display.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed, I have Starbucks coffee mugs and I can't even use it for them. I was hoping to use it for a display but it is actually useless to use at all.
customer_reviews.author: joannarosa469

customer_reviews.title: holds more mugs than most
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy and holds more mugs than most of my other holders.
customer_reviews.author: David at beach

customer_reviews.title: Mug Holder
customer_reviews.text: The mug holder fits my space. It is exactly what I needed for my mugs. There is no durability rating because I haven't had the mug holder long enough to determine durability.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Loutzenhiser

customer_reviews.title: ... that we wanted to display and this product is perfect! We were able to fit all of them
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we had a bunch of cute Mexican mugs that we wanted to display and this product is perfect ! We were able to fit all of them !
customer_reviews.author: Yadira Villalobos Mojica

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Really like it. Comes in handy in a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This rack holds more than you think. It just fit on my coffee cart to hold the mugs that I wanted it to. Was priced very reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann

customer_reviews.title: I like it and it does what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it does what I expected. However, large cups don't fit well and I'm a little disappointed on the way the display looks. But it keeps the cups handy and that is what it is designed to do. If all my cups were the same size, I would love it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Durrett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Mug Holder, Decorative
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty when all the cups hang on it. Looks like a decoration as well as very functional. Great purchase. Problem is when it's a tall cup, it may fall off. No problem with short mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Eye4things

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Made well, strong, and good looking. I'm using it for Italian wine glasses. They are a little larger then shot glasses and weigh more. So the rack works perfectly. The price was great also.
customer_reviews.author: ROGER ERICKSON

customer_reviews.title: Nice handy space saving item
customer_reviews.text: I debated purchasing this item and looked at many different ones like it before deciding on this one. After receiving it and putting it to use, I have no regrets. It's a great rack for storing your coffee cups in a handy spot for anyone wanting their morning cup of coffee. It holds several cups and saves much needed space in the cabinets
customer_reviews.author: C. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. I love the broad base which makes the tree very stable and don't have to worry if it's going to trip over due to imbalance. I also like the fact that I can hang the coffee mugs by the handle or by inverting over the branches. Also it holds more mugs than any other mug tree I have used before. I am very happy with this purchase. The only thing I don't know is how well it resists rusting.
customer_reviews.author: Sakthikumar Ambady

customer_reviews.title: Compact storage for mugs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dad to put on his counter. He has a lot of mugs and this cleared up a lot of space in his cupboard. Easy to grab when he wants a cup of coffee and makes storing his mugs easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: I have created a coffee station and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This item is used everyday. It has allowed me to free up premium cabinet space by clearing out mugs and placing this rack right next to the coffee maker. I have created a coffee station and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sally snyder

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, but all the prongs are not useable
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice, but all the prongs are not useable. The bottom level cannot be used because the cups hit the counter. Also, large mups will not fit in this. Have to hang glasses by their handle to fit any glass as the prongs are too short to support a glass from the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution.
customer_reviews.text: We collect a lot of cups over the years. Great way to store them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Holds coffee mugs well. you may have to skip a few hooks depending on the size of your mugs, but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jake S

customer_reviews.title: Mug Tree
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. All my mugs fit and I have room for more. This matches my kitchen accessories perfectly. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the product mainly for its compact size than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the product mainly for its compact size than the rest. Its sturdy so far and it looks great on my coffee bar . Price too expensive for size but still happy
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great for Rae dunn cups
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped quickly but if you using for Rae dun you will not be able to use the lower row. So this is really a 10 cup holder. But I really like it and no issues with toppling with my dunn on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Great item and great size.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a gift for my father and he loved it. He is so happy with it over all.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica V Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the y have the bottom hooks? You can't use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to hold bracelets and to hang my many earrings on. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My mug holder tree was at my house when I ...
customer_reviews.text: My mug holder tree was at my house when I got home from work. I was excited to open it, put it on my countertop and fill it with mugs. It's so much nicer to look at then just having my mugs all over.
customer_reviews.author: D. Frazier

customer_reviews.title: MOM'S DAY, SHE LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to Mom today as her Mother's Day gift...it's what she wanted. She was delighted to get this and automatically put the cups on. The seller gets an A+ from me. Quality product and delivered promolty. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Reddish

customer_reviews.title: Regular cups preferred
customer_reviews.text: This holder was chosen because it was sturdier seeming than others, and shorter stature. It is. However, for my mugs it doesn’t work as well as I had hoped. Better for coffee cups of dinner settings than oversized mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product to hold my large collection of coffee mugs! One thing I did find was that I wasn’t able to place them by their handles as shown in the photos, but they fit perfectly by flipping them upside down. It also works well with my stemless wine glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing bracelets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding bracelets- can see them all at a glance.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of the Bride

customer_reviews.title: Perfect....
customer_reviews.text: I luv it I use it for my Rae Dunn collection A+++
customer_reviews.author: Mothaof4

customer_reviews.title: Mugs and more mugs
customer_reviews.text: Due to the fact that I sent my daughter and son-in-law several mugs for gifts; they needed room to put them. They were happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I currently have this on my counter with all my Rae Dunn mugs and LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Black

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Rae Dunn mugs. No issues. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but smaller than i wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little bigger for my Rae Dunn mugs, but it is nice and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Heather mcgraw

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this mug holder would hold 15 of my mugs. I was very disappointed and am returning my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: towanda1948

customer_reviews.title: Love the product and the seller
customer_reviews.text: We love our mug holder! It doesn't fit our larger mugs but all of our standard ones fit perfectly. It's very sturdy, and well made. They have great customer service abd are very personal with their business. I'll definitely buy from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Mav and Des's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great size and color
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and is perfect fit for my Rae Dunn mugs and tea pot
customer_reviews.author: Judith Swain

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This cup holder was exactly what I needed. It’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Caperton

customer_reviews.title: Love this mug holder
customer_reviews.text: Love this mug holder. I just wish it had longer legs or a higher platform on the bottom. The mugs you put there pretty much simply lay on the table or counter.
customer_reviews.author: gagaoriginal

customer_reviews.title: How big it will be
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and how it can hold a lot of cups, in different styles too
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Chu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I have a collection of large mugs. This product is just what I was looking for. It is large enough and strong enough to hold my mugs. LOVE, LOVE it. Seller was prompt and my item was delivered quickly. would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Weber

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL - MUGS WON’t ALL FIT
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get all mugs on . It doesn’t have enough room. The mugs hang too far down to get more than 2 rows. Not a good product!!

customer_reviews.title: Great Mug Tree
customer_reviews.text: I love the one I bought for my coffee mugs. I bought the second one for my grandson and his fiancee.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Ebeling

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just as described. I use Rae Dunn mugs which are large, so it takes up a lot of space on my counter because of that, but it's exactly what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Mangum

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews before I bought this ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews before I bought this, it sits so low to the counter that you can't hang mugs on it. You end up hanging them as if drying rather than by their handles.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R

customer_reviews.title: Not properly wrapped for shipment
customer_reviews.text: I like the mug rack itself...but was surprised it was not wrapped in bubble..it was with loose plastic and when it got delivered..2 stems were broken off..didn't bother 2 return .would have cost me more money..
customer_reviews.author: debraJo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Holds more cups than expected. Which is great.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Got it for my office coffee table and everyone commented how much they liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Analee R

customer_reviews.title: Great for mug lovers!
customer_reviews.text: I got my mom this for mother’s day because her mugs were everywhere! Now they’re nice and neat. She definitely loves it and it compliments the kitchen. I’d recommend it if you have lots of mugs bc it holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This mug holder is perfect for all of my Rae Dunn mugs. Super durable and very cost effective!
customer_reviews.author: Mmcelroy0713

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my daughter-in-law. Received it quickly and in good condition. I feel she will love it. It is made well and will fit well with her decor. Would by from seller again, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Williams

customer_reviews.title: She likes to collect a little larger coffee cups and the base is wide and sturdy. It holds all of her cups and handles ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for for my daughter's first apartment. She likes to collect a little larger coffee cups and the base is wide and sturdy. It holds all of her cups and handles the weight exactly as I had hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Cup Holder
customer_reviews.text: Looks good in the kitchen. Keeps the coffee cups close & ready for action for that morning cup of joe. The coffee cups become kitchen decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Mug holder
customer_reviews.text: Fits alot of mugs. Just what I need. I can turn it to.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Schoener

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product & Seller!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! The seller got it here just on time and it looks great in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: KittyB

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line is useless.
customer_reviews.text: Too short for coffee cups. I can’t put cups on the bottom without them scraping the surface of what I put it on. Other than that, it’s good quality and works for my cups for the top rows.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Compliments my decor
customer_reviews.text: I love I it! Doesn't scratch the counter, isn't too big, very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Shari Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love this mug holder tree
customer_reviews.text: I love this mug holder tree. It holds a lot of coffee cups. It came in quickly and I had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Holds heavy mugs well and does not tip if the load is uneven
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: My mugs are big, but the device holds all of them. The unit is sturdy with a design that won't tip over. The mug holder tree is a convenient way to store mugs in a kitchen with limited cabinet space.
customer_reviews.author: Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: Never buy
customer_reviews.text: Just past 1 year and already rust are showing up at legs. Says durable..... ????
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mug holder!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it next to our coffee maker to hold all our mugs. It seems like they will fall off easily but so far none have and I’ve had it for months. I like it!!
customer_reviews.author: KayBee

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected and the bottom row is not even usable! Looks clunky and takes up counter space. Overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It would have been nice if it was raised a little higher from the ...
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if it was raised a little higher from the base to the bottom ring of hooks. I would've also liked to of had the hooks out further so that they could have been easier to hang coffee cups and mugs from. My coffee cups are about 20oz and could not hang off of the hooks and some of them couldn't balance off of them when inverted either. The picture with cups on the holder is some what deceiving, I think that they should of included a cup size in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The mug tree holder looks great, but the prongs are way too close together ...
customer_reviews.text: The mug tree holder looks great, but the prongs are way too close together to use more than the top and base, or by alternating the cups so much it still works out to two out of the three rings. There needs to be more distance between each ring. This would be a good keychain holder?
customer_reviews.author: Lori Antifave

customer_reviews.title: My only disappointment is I cannot put mugs on all three rows ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nce product that is solidly made. My only disappointment is I cannot put mugs on all three rows as advertised. Thus the 4 stars vs 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cups fell off
customer_reviews.text: I return this item the cups would wobble, I think the stems need to be longer
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I tried many but this one is the most sturdy! Deserve a five star
customer_reviews.author: Nesma Gawish

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if you showed it with mugs on it.  That might have given me a better perspective.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made. Strong enough and steady. It was not quite what I wanted. I am keeping it. Just needed to set my mugs in a different place. The advertisement was correct. My vision of using it not so quite on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but I am happy that I have an entire corner in which I ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds my coffee cups, but I am happy that I have an entire corner in which I keep it, because it takes up a fair bit of room.
customer_reviews.author: Eran Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Space saver! Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly where I needed it! Holds quite a few cups so that’s nice! Helps save space
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Clark

customer_reviews.title: which I enjoy, but the bottom row doesn't hold the mugs ...
customer_reviews.text: This works really well for mid sized cups, not oversized. It gave me back a decent amount of cabinet space, which I enjoy, but the bottom row doesn't hold the mugs without the rims touching the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Putnam

product_meta.title: Sorbus Mug Holder Tree Organizer/Drying Rack Stand (Bronze)
feature_bullets: This bronze mug holder is made out of high quality durable metal with a smooth bronze finish touch, the 3 tiered rack holds 15 coffee or tea mugs bottles and Glasses
Can be used on you counter for display or on the table while eating and in your cabinets for storage, also great for restaurants offices wedding halls next to the coffee and tea
Can be used as a drying rack for mugs cups bottles drinking glasses shot glasses and containers
The color finish will give it a real décor attractive look to keep out on the counter year round while showing off your mug collection
Nice heavy flat base ring for Stability product dimensions are 10 inches High- MUGS ARE NOT INCLUDED
